New Records: Orlando Magic set a franchise record with nine three-pointers in the first quarter and 13 in the first half
Key Match Events: Orlando Magic's 23-6 run in the final five minutes of the first quarter
Toronto Raptors struggled to close aggressive shooters leading to three-pointers for Orlando
Post-Match Reflections: Jakob Poeltl and Darko Rajakovic highlighted defensive mistakes and the impact of Orlando's three-point shooting
Miscellaneous Highlights: Orlando Magic played much of the game without star guard Jalen Suggs due to injury
